effect_entries.effect: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user gains an intimidating leer with
sharp eyes. The opposing team’s
Defense stats are reduced.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The opposing team gains an intimidating
leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team’s
Defense stats are reduced.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The foe is given an
intimidating leer with
sharp eyes.
The target’s Defense
stat is reduced.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Frightens the foe with a
leer to lower DEFENSE.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is given an
intimidating look
that lowers its
DEFENSE stat.
